title: Lost connection for a bit, everything reconnected except LoL
body:
It kept attempting to reconnect, waited 30 minutes for it to reconnect, but it wasn't working. 

I had to leave the game even though the client couldn't reconnect, and now I'm on leaverbuster. 

I don't understand how everything can reconnect except this.

replies.body: Its amazing, happens to a friend of mine all the time. He will be in a game or at the character select, then the game will freeze and go black. He then has to relogg in the hopes that he can get the game to load. Most of the time it just kicks him back out to the main menu and he gets leaverbuster ban all the time. GG rito!

Your friend sounds like he's having network problems, which is further affirmed by the black screen which can happen after failing to download assets.  Toss him the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I hope that helps!

It seems like your network is losing comms with the game server and trying to get you back in.  Go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot whatever is causing that block to get back in.  Let me know if you have any questions!
